content.text:
Dear Joaquin

Hello, my friend! I hope you are doing just fine. I'm writing to you because I finally decided to accept your invitation and go visit you in Mexico City! You have told me there are several places nearby where we can go camping and hiking in the forest. You well know how much I love outdoor activities and mostly walking among the trees and sleeping below the stars. Tell me what equipment you have so I can make a list of the items I have to carry with me. Let me know if you have a tent, a lantern, a camp stove and some rope because if not, I will be bringing mine. You also need to tell me the dates you will be available so I can mark it on my calendar and finish planning my trip. I thank you very much my friend and let me tell you that I'm really looking forward to seeing you again after all these years. We have a lot to talk about and more adventures to have together.

I will be seeing you soon my friend.

Greetings, Peter.
